abstracts.cdata!:
Sri Lanka aims to raise the incomes,
            employment and living standards of the rural population of
            the Mannar and the Vavuniya districts through this Third
            Rural Development Project. It includes: (a) rehabilitation
            of irrigation tanks; (b) forestry and horticultural
            development; (c) provision of inputs and services for
            directly productive sectors; and (d) development of economic
            and social infrastructure. As a result, disparities in
            living standards within the districts and between the
            districts and the country as a whole will diminish.
